name: com.htc.upm.vivehandtracking
description:
A cross platform tool to track hand position (21 points) and gesture recognition using the front camera(s) of devices.
Supported devices: Vive, VIVE Pro, VIVE Pro Eye, VIVE Pro 2, VIVE Cosmos, VIVE Cosmos XR, VIVE Focus Plus, VIVE Focus, Valve Index and Android phones (with or without ARCore).

Note 1: Requires OpenVR package from Valve for PC VR HMDs.
Note 2: Requires Wave Native package (version 1.x) for VIVE Focus or Focus Plus.
Note 3: Requires Wave Native package (version 4.0 or newer) for VIVE Focus 3.

samples.description: Common hand tracking sample for object interaction, UI interaction and custom gestures.
